features: 【Package Content】You will get 3PCS metal combs in different styles and sizes respectively in 23cm/18cm/17cm,which can meet your different daily use.
【Product Material】Our metal afro comb for curly hair is made of solid steel and plastic that are durable and sturdy. The plastic handle can easily handle thick and tangled hair.
【Reasonable Designl】Our wide plastic afro metal comb for secure grip and clenched fist handle design is in fist handle design, beautiful and strong grip.
【Durable & Portable】The teeth of afro combs for women or men are rust, break,and bend-resistant. Lightweight and compact,combs for women is easy to carry and perfect for on-the-go styling.
【Wide Applicaions】The hair pick is suitable for thick hair,beards,thick wavy hair,tangled hair,oily hair,especially for afro hair styling.
